coreCapabilities.title: Conflict & Protest Forecasting
coreCapabilities.description: Predictive modeling of violence, unrest, and instability at subnational levels using RNNs, LSTMs, and temporal clustering.

coreCapabilities.title: Exposure-Based Risk Modeling
coreCapabilities.description: Converts regional instability forecasts into financial or operational risk estimates for specific firms, supply chains, or portfolios.

coreCapabilities.title: Geopolitical ESG Analytics
coreCapabilities.description: Aligns forecasts with EU Taxonomy and SFDR criteria for sustainable investment screening.

coreCapabilities.title: API + Dashboard Delivery
coreCapabilities.description: Forecasts accessible via JSON API, CSV downloads, and a web-based dashboard for analysts and executives.

products.name: Portfolio Risk Intelligence (PRI)
products.description: Enables asset managers and quant teams to integrate predictive geopolitical risk into portfolio construction and monitoring.
useCases: Rebalance portfolios to reduce exposure to regions with rising conflict or protest risk
Incorporate AICAP scores into quantitative models for Sharpe-optimized returns
Backtest risk-adjusted returns using historical AICAP forecast accuracy
Monitor geopolitical risk concentration across sovereign and corporate holdings
features: Monthly forecast updates with API access
Portfolio screening, alerts, and dashboard visualizations
Integration-ready with Excel, Python, or portfolio management platforms
products.audience: Institutional investors, hedge funds, ESG fund managers, quant researchers

products.name: Catastrophic Civil Risk Forecast (CCRF)
products.description: Empowers insurers and reinsurers to anticipate, price, and manage risk from civil unrest, including SRCC (strikes, riots, civil commotion).
useCases: Improve pricing accuracy for SRCC cover in high-risk regions
Simulate correlated risk in multi-country reinsurance portfolios
Support treaty negotiation and loss mitigation strategy
features: Regional SRCC risk forecasts (1-12 month horizon)
products.audience: Political risk underwriters, reinsurance analysts, catastrophe modelers

products.name: GeoESG Compliance Engine (GCE)
products.description: Enhances ESG screening and sustainable finance compliance by flagging corporate and sovereign exposure to conflict-prone geographies.
useCases: Filter portfolios for firms operating in or sourcing from unstable regions
Score sovereign issuers for conflict or repression indicators
Document conflict exposure in ESG reporting frameworks
features: Reporting modules for regulators or clients
Downloadable datasets, PDF reports, and API access
products.audience: ESG analysts, fund managers, compliance officers, data vendors

products.name: Conflict Early Warning Portal (CEWP)
products.description: Supports journalists, NGOs, and humanitarian planners with structured, open-access forecasts of global conflict risk.
useCases: Plan emergency response based on predictive conflict models
Support journalism with forecast-informed visual narratives
Power advocacy campaigns with early warning insights
features: Regional dashboards and live forecast feeds
products.audience: Newsrooms, humanitarian NGOs, international advocacy groups

products.name: Conflict-Sensitive Equity Screening
products.description: Screens public companies for exposure to conflict-affected countries using forecast-adjusted scoring.
useCases: Detect firms at risk due to operations in unstable countries (e.g., DRC, Nigeria)
Monitor stock price volatility after forecasted conflict events
Support analyst briefings and risk-adjusted target price revisions
features: Custom filters by region, sector, or exposure type
products.audience: Equity analysts, ESG screeners, risk consultants
